scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.gqlgen: cd services && (go run github.com/99designs/gqlgen@v0.17.84 generate || true) && go run ./tools/add_import.go
scripts.start:backend: cd services && go run -ldflags "-X main.Version=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty)" main.go
scripts.start:app: npm run sync:expo && cd expo && bunx expo start
scripts.build:backend: cd services && go build -ldflags "-X main.Version=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty)" -o backend
